Description: Hollow-cast copper alloy amuletic figure of a bovine, perhaps Isis mother of Apis or the Hathor cow wearing the sun-disc with plumes and horns; double suspension ring on back.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.25
Bibliographic references: Shaw & Nicholson 1995 / British Museum Dictionary of Ancient Egypt (p249)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Emily Anne Beaufort Smythe, Viscountess Strangford
